generated_text:
- road: The cobblestone surface extending from the foreground into the distance is clearly a road.
- sidewalk: The paved areas on both sides of the road, bordered by curbs and planters, are designated for pedestrians.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, including the yellow and beige structures visible.
- vegetation: Trees and potted plants are visible along the sidewalks and in front of buildings.
- pole: A blue traffic sign is mounted on a vertical pole on the left side of the road.
- traffic sign: A blue traffic sign indicating pedestrian crossing and parking restrictions is visible on the left.
- person: A person can be seen standing near the entrance of a building on the right side of the street.
- car: The Mercedes-Benz logo visible on the hood of the vehicle from which the photo is taken indicates the presence of a car.
